entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person who speaks in the story. He is addressed by 'My Lord' and has a cold voice with a note of menace.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a boy mentioned in the conversation between Wormtail and My Lord.

relationships.description: Wormtail speaks to My Lord, as evidenced by the dialogue where Wormtail addresses My Lord directly.
Wormtail mentions Harry Potter in his conversation with My Lord.
